entry.title: The need for larger blocks
entry.summary: In an email exchange on 6/27/2015 at 3:09 PM, Wladimir J. van der Laan expressed uncertainty about proposing ideas and having a single "decider" judge their level of controversy. He suggested waiting until things have cooled down before making proposals. The concern was raised that with enough dissenting voices, any change could be made to seem controversial.
